title: As a Tester, I want test that the BOC's Drug Request Form Statuses Were Updated Properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a Tester
AND logged in as BOC

State Flow and Mapping:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/State+Flow+and+Mapping

BOC Widget Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery

Reg Analyst Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery

Club Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Drug Requests
custom_expected: THEN the Boc's Drug Request statuses were updated properly

title: As a BOC User I want to update the status of Drug Test Requests from the widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_analyst

States:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/State+Flow+and+Mapping
custom_steps:
WHEN On the BOC's Drug Test Request widget
AND clicking the checkbox on a Drug Request's row
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Update Status button as depicted in the wire
AND will activate the "Update Status" button in the footer of the widget
AND Multiple checkboxes may be clicked
AND Clicking the button will launch a popover where the user can choose a new status
AND Users may choose from ANY status
AND Clicking the apply button within the popover will update the chosen requests to the specified status

title: As a Reg Analyst I want to update the status of Drug Test Requests from the widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has  Drug Testing Reg Analyst role on their account

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_analyst

States:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/State+Flow+and+Mapping
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Reg Analyst's Drug Test Request widget
AND Clicking the checkbox on a Drug Request's row
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Update Status button as depicted in the wire
AND  the "Update Status" button in the footer of the widget will be activated
AND Multiple checkboxes may be clicked
AND Clicking the button will launch a popover where the user can choose a new status
AND Users may choose from ANY status
AND Clicking the apply button within the popover will update the chosen requests to the specified status

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit a submitted Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN an Edit button will be available anytime the form is in view mode if the viewing user has edit permissions
AND Clicking  Edit will reload the form in edit mode, where there will be a Save button and a Cancel button in place of the Edit button. 
AND Clicking Save will commit changes and reload the form in View mode.
AND Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm they wish to discard their changes
AND If they confirm the decision, their changes will be discarded and the form will reload in view mode
AND If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a BOC User I want to Create a Profile for a Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profile

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to BOC's Drug Test Request widget
AND Clicking the Create New Profile button
custom_expected:
THEN player's without ebis profiles will have a 'Create Profile' button in the ebisID column as depicted
AND Only Admin users will be able to click the button
AND a intl ama match checks will run
AND If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned
AND here will be a Create New Player button and a Cancel button on the modal
AND Clicking Cancel will close the modal and return the user to their entry point
AND Clicking Create New Player will load a new intl amateur player profile in edit mode
AND The new profile will be pre-populated with information from the Drug Test Request form
AND This includes all Player Info, Contact Info, and Trainer / Agent Info
AND The profile will be subject to all existing rules and will function like other registration profiles
AND The existing drug test request will be linked to the new profile

title: As a Reg Analyst User, I want to Create a Profile for a Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Reg Analyst

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profile

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN player's without ebis profiles will have a 'Create Profile' button in the ebisID column as depicted
AND Only Admin users will be able to click the button
AND Clicking the Create New Profile button will run intl ama match checks
AND If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned
AND There will be a Create New Player button and a Cancel button on the modal
AND Clicking Cancel will close the modal and return the user to their entry point
AND Clicking Create New Player will load a new intl amateur player profile in edit mode
AND The new profile will be pre-populated with information from the Drug Test Request form
AND This includes all Player Info, Contact Info, and Trainer / Agent Info
AND The profile will be subject to all existing rules and will function like other registration profiles
AND The existing drug test request will be linked to the new profile

title: As a BOC User I want to link an existing Profile to a Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profile

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Request widget
AND searching for for a profile
custom_expected:
THEN If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned
AND There will be a Link Request button on the modal
AND Selecting a matching player will activate the button
AND Clicking the the button will link the request to the selected player and dismiss the modal
AND The widget will reload and the selected player's ebisID will be displayed
AND The player's name will also be a hyperlink the profile
AND Contact Info / Trainer Info will get moved to existing profile as a new origin

title: As a user I want any drug test requests to be moved to the new player ID during an international player merge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club
custom_steps: WHEN performing a merger of two International Amateur Players
custom_expected:
THEN Following the merger any drug request Drug Test Requests (regardless of state) will be move to the new PlayerID
AND The new ID will be reflected in the EBIS ID column of the 3 Drug Testing Widgets

title: Add Fields to Trainer profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347878
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to International Trainer/Agent profile
custom_expected: THEN  Partnership Program (checkbox) and Academy Name will be added to the International Trainer/Agent profile
